Articles.Content:
...be strong for mother

This started off as a speed sculpt of an insane kerbal - before I got terrified of his expression and stopped work. Couple of hours of overpainting in photoshop tonight and I think I salvaged it from the creeps. Now it's just heart wrenching

Edited May 31, 2014 by Daishi

D'awwwww...

No one gets left behind

Aww. It's beautiful, in a sad emotional way. This picture should be dedicated to all those kerbals who unexpectedly find/found themselves in small cans far from home, for much longer than they ever expected.

Aww. It's beautiful, in a sad emotional way. This picture should be dedicated to all those kerbals who unexpectedly find/found themselves in small cans far from home, for much longer than they ever expected.

Thankyou, and hear-hear! I don't send my Kerbalnauts down to planets without at least a few contingency plans if something goes wrong. Here's hoping 0.24 contracts, reputation and currency make Kerbals a little less expendable

(But maybe this picture is just a reaction shot of Jeb realising someone at all the snacks - who knows
